Uses of Package
org.ow2.bonita.env

Packages that use org.ow2.bonita.env
org.ow2.bonita.env Provides classes and interfaces describing the environment. 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.ejb Provides classes to execute remote Commands. 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.rest.wrapper   
org.ow2.bonita.facade.runtime.command Contains classes in order to work with Bonita console (internal use only). 
org.ow2.bonita.util Contains classes shared by the entire engine. 
 

Classes in org.ow2.bonita.env used by org.ow2.bonita.env
Context
          A group of named objects in an Environment that have a similar lifespan.
Environment
          maintains contextual information for a thread in a set of Contexts.
